ModMetaData.name: Melee Animation
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru
ModMetaData.description:
Adds detailed melee combat animations, including duels, executions, and unique skills. Also (optionally) adds lassos to pull enemies into melee range.
* Equip colonists with melee weapons (or melee sidearms) and they will be animated! * Draft a melee colonist and you can right-click on targets to execute or lasso them. * Place down a Duel Spot (under the Misc tab) to have your colonists engage in friendly duels. * Craft Lassos at a tailor bench and equip them to pawns for an edge against gunfighters. * Cast powerful Unique Skills when certain requirements are met (see steam page). Load as far down as possible.
